quote: Progress is impossible without change, and those who cannot change their minds cannot change anything.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: The ultimate test of manтАЩs conscience may be his willingness to sacrifice something today for future generations whose words of thanks will not be heard.
author: Gaylord Nelson

quote: If you can't explain it simply, you don't understand it well enough.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Poetry is when an emotion has found its thought and the thought has found words.
author: Robert Frost
